name: aiverify-fairness-metrics-toolbox-for-regression
summary: AI Verify Fairness Metrics Toolbox (FMT) for Regression contains a list of fairness metrics used to measure how resources (e.g. opportunities, food, loan, medical help) are allocated among the demographic groups (e.g. married male, married female) given a set of sensitive feature(s) (e.g. gender, marital status). This plugin is developed for regression models.
author: AI Verify
